name: YesWeHack VR
summary:
VR immersion in a hacker’s shoes 

You are invited to a unique immersive journey by getting in the shoes of an ethical hacker in a bug bounty program. Understand his approach from the discovery of the scope to the search for vulnerabilities, the use of proper tools to analyse them and the reporting of the latter based on severity.  In a gamification mode, you will follow the usual steps of a hunter on the YesWeHack platform up to possible rewards for the best!

-->YesWeHack is the #1 European Bug Bounty...
